Target: radioactive container sent from the nuclear technology firm Studsvik to the US

text: According to all indications , the radioactive container sent from the nuclear technology firm Studsvik to the US did not leak during transport within Sweden . When the container was transshipped in Paris , measurements showed no abnormal levels , according to the US Transport Department .
